entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 3 with risk of frost.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries after midnight. Snow level 1800 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 3 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Flurries over northern sections in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
